selected_quotes: Marcapasos que genera su propia energia.
Self-Powered Cardiac Pacemaker Enabled Single Crystalline PMN-PT Piezoelectric Energy Harvester #andyresearch

citation.abstract: A flexible single-crystalline PMN-PT piezoelectric energy harvester is demonstrated to achieve a self-powered artificial cardiac pacemaker. The energy-harvesting device generates a short-circuit current of 0.223 mA and an open-circuit voltage of 8.2 V, which are enough not only to meet the standard for charging commercial batteries but also for stimulating the heart without an external power source.
citation.title: Self‐Powered Cardiac Pacemaker Enabled by Flexible Single Crystalline PMN‐PT Piezoelectric Energy Harvester
